overview:
Jonah is founder and CEO of Floq, a web-application for surveys and comparitive benchmarking, and Operations Director of Integral Development a boutique leadership development and consulting firm.

Prior to this Jonah was Marketing Director and Head of Painting at the Art Academy in London and taught at St Oswalds School of Painting, also in London.

Jonah has experience in teaching and designing leadership and philosophy programs for young people both within Australia and the UK over the last ten years, holds a BA from Curtin University and an MSA from Sydney University.
